F

FileSearcher - Class in <Unnamed>
This program allows the user to search for files easily.
findFile(String, int) - Static method in class FileSearcher
Finds the first instance of a file that matches the name
findFile(String, File, int) - Static method in class FileSearcher
Finds the first instance of a file that matches the name
findFiles(String, int) - Static method in class FileSearcher
Finds all the files that match the name
findFiles(String, File, int) - Static method in class FileSearcher
Finds all the files that match the name
findFiles(int, String...) - Static method in class FileSearcher
Finds all the files that have one of the given extensions
findFiles(File, int, String...) - Static method in class FileSearcher
Finds all the files that have one of the given extensions
findFolder(String, int) - Static method in class FileSearcher
Finds a folder with the given name
findFolder(String, File, int) - Static method in class FileSearcher
Finds a folder with the given name
findFolders(String, int) - Static method in class FileSearcher

findFolders(String, File, int) - Static method in class FileSearcher
